scripts.build:android: mkdirp dist && mkdirp dist/res && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform android --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.jsbundle --assets-dest dist/res --reset-cache
scripts.build:ios: mkdirp dist && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.jsbundle --assets-dest dist --reset-cache
